name: A Settler's Conquest
description:
Your story begins as you open your eyes, blinking in the bright light, you look around. You are surrounded by large trees. In the distance you see some settlements...

A fun little text based adventure story spin off I made in a few days. You play as a settler in my game The Settlers' Conquest: https://lvwatts.itch.io/the-settlers-conquest    Go check that out after this!

Note: There are some paths that are incomplete at the moment if pressing a key does not advance the page, you may have to restart the story by pressing R.
